                    throws MachineGatewayException

      • addDataSubscriptionListener

        void addDataSubscriptionListener(List<String> subscriptions,
                               IDataSubscriptionListener listener)
                                 throws MachineGatewayException
        Add the listener to all subscriptions specified in the subscription list.
        Parameters:
        subscriptions - List of subscriptions to add the listener to
        listener - Subscription listener to be added
        Throws:
        MachineGatewayException - if specified subscription or listener is not found.

      • removeDataSubscriptionListener

        void removeDataSubscriptionListener(List<String> subscriptions,
                                  IDataSubscriptionListener listener)
                                    throws MachineGatewayException
        Remove the listener to all subscriptions specified in the subscription list.
        Parameters:
        subscriptions - List of subscriptions to remove the listener from
        listener - Subscription listener to be removed
        Throws:
        MachineGatewayException - if specified subscription or listener is not specified.
